content.text:
# National Register of Historic Places listings in Howard County, Arkansas

__NOTOC__
This is a list of the National Register of Historic Places listings in Howard County, Arkansas.
This is intended to be a complete list of the properties on the National Register of Historic Places in Howard County, Arkansas, United States. The locations of National Register properties for which the latitude and longitude coordinates are included below, may be seen in a map.
There are 13 properties listed on the National Register in the county. Six other properties were once listed but have been removed.
Current listings
|}
Former listings
|}
